original_text: Listen, Joshua, most important priest of the Lord. Listen you priests that sit with Joshua. You are like a sign. People can look at you. And they can know that good things will happen in future years. See! I will bring to you my servant who is called The Branch.
korean_text: 대제사장 여호수아야 너와 네 앞에 앉은 네 동료들은 내 말을 들을 것이니라 이들은 예표의 사람들이라 내가 내 종 싹을 나게 하리라

sentences.original_text: Listen, Joshua, most important priest of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 들어라, 여호수아여, 주의 가장 중요한 제사장이여.

sentences.original_text: Listen you priests that sit with Joshua.
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아와 함께 앉아 있는 제사장들이여, 들어라.

sentences.original_text: And they can know that good things will happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 좋은 일들이 일어날 것임을 알 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: I will bring to you my servant
